channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ND
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ND

item.title: Report X-2023080650
item.description:
Report X-2023080650

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-03
  • City: FARGO
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found by manager on rollers. Driver had coded it a 10 and wrote it was leaking from the corner. Manager did not know how package ended up receiving damage and had found it after the driver already left. No one was around when manager found package and he did not find any package handler who knew what happened to the package. QA placed damaged hazmat into a lined hazmat bin and inspected item. DescribePack: Outer box ripped open at corner and bag of powder ripped near the seal at the corner. Powder leaked out of package. It is a 1/2 in. hole in the bag. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon discovery, immediately placed package in a lined hazmat drum before it was brought to QA area for processing.

item.title: Report E-2023080499
item.description:
Report E-2023080499

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-02
  • City: WEST FARGO
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.
